job.title: Software RD Engineer of Test System
job.description: <strong>Software RD Engineer of Test System<br></strong><ul><li>全球半導體測試系統龍頭外商公司</li><li>極具競爭力的薪資報酬及福利制度<br><br></li><strong>About Our Client<br><br></strong>我的客戶是全球半導體測試系統龍頭外商公司，營業據點遍佈全球各地，陸續設立二十多家海外分公司，且為國內最大之IC產品測試設備供應商。<br><br><strong>Job Description<br><br></strong><ul><li> In response to internal customer requirement</li><li> Interfaces with internal team and Manufacturing to ensure that the early pilot units meet all requirements and ship on time.</li><li> Investigates emerging production test technologies and develops concepts for future test products.</li><li> Develops complex specifications, statements of work, metrics, schedules and budgets.</li><li> Technically manages key suppliers that are critical to project success. This includes assisting in source selection, participating in supplier design reviews, etc.<br><br></li></ul><strong>The Successful Applicant<br><br></strong><ul><li> 5+ years of experience as firmware or software engineers.</li><li> Experience capturing customer's SW requirements into technical specifications and statements of work is a plus.</li><li> Good communication skill in English<br><br></li></ul><strong>What's On Offer<br><br></strong>極具競爭力的薪資報酬及福利制度<br><br>加分的職涯發展及開放的工作環境<br><br><strong>Contact: Pierce Jen<br></strong><strong>Quote job ref: 4207305</strong></ul>
